snippet: NBC announced on Tuesday that it had extended the show’s finale another 15 minutes, meaning the episode set for May 16 will run from 9 to 10:15 p.m.
abstract: NBC extends final episode of The Office to an hour and 15 minutes; speculation increases that longtime star Steve Carell will make appearance.
lead_paragraph: NBC announced on Tuesday that it had extended the show’s finale another 15 minutes, meaning the episode set for May 16 will run from 9 to 10:15 p.m.

headline.main: ‘The Office’ Gets an Extra 15 Minutes to Say Goodbye
headline.print_headline: Upsizing the Finale Of ‘The Office’ on NBC
